CommunARTy
{!Contact.FirstName}
You voted them on during The Challenge...they work hard to represent YOUR voice, now, the NW Youth Board, bring YOU, The Challenge Graduates..CommunARTy
If you haven't already seen the info on Facebook or TCS website, CommunARTy is a fun-filled, unique and awesome day of community action designed to combine music, art and charity whilst also offering the chance to catch up with your Challenge friends
On the 15th February (Half term), Challengers from ALL NW 2011 waves are invited to join us in Preston to help local NW charities, take part in an interactive art challenge, and enjoy the musical entertainment and talents of up-and-coming bands and artists from across the region - all put together by your Challenge Youth Board representatives!
There is no charge to attend (tonnes of awesome musical acts..for free?? AMAZING!) all we ask is that if you can, you bring a donation of food (cans/dried foods) or old clothes to add to our collection that will be leave for the Salvation Army and Dovedale Pride - two charities supporting those in need in Preston
IMPORTANT!! Places on the day are limited so confirm your attendance by logging onto the Challenge Society website and clicking on CommunARTy! Login to the Challenge Society website to RSVP.
There will be transport provided for those coming from Bury - but we NEED TO KNOW IF YOU ARE COMING
Where: Salvation Army, Harrington Street Preston, Lancashire PR1 7BN
When: 1pm - 7pm
Wednesday 15th February 2012
